text: The 2002–03 Heineken Cup was the eighth edition of the Heineken Cup. Competing teams from France, Ireland, Italy, Wales, England and Scotland, were divided into six pools of four, in which teams played home and away matches against each other. The pool winners and two best runners-up qualified for the knock- out stages. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" width=100% |- !France !England !Wales !Scotland !Ireland !Italy |- valign=top | * Béziers * Perpignan * Bourgoin * Montferrand * Toulouse * Biarritz Olympique | * Leicester Tigers * Gloucester * Sale Sharks * Bristol * London Irish * Northampton Saints | * Neath * Llanelli * Swansea *
